meanings.definition: A person who is not an economist.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a noneconomist and prefers to study history instead of economics.
meanings.sent2: The noneconomist at the meeting had a different perspective on the financial situation.
meanings.sent3: The noneconomist tried to explain the stock market but ended up talking about gardening.
meanings.sent4: She navigated the world of finance like a noneconomist lost in a maze.
meanings.sent5: As a noneconomist, he struggled to understand the complex economic theories.

meanings.sent1: The book club focused on noneconomist topics like literature and art.
meanings.sent2: Her noneconomist background gave her a unique perspective on the business world.
meanings.sent3: The noneconomist approach to budgeting involved a lot of guesswork.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a noneconomist canvas, free from the constraints of financial thinking.
meanings.sent5: The noneconomist viewpoint brought a fresh outlook to the economic discussion.
